markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Talisman Cord](/Equipment.aspx?ID=883)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All characters have access to this item_

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This thin leather cord bears delicate runic markings and threads through an item that can bear affixed [talismans](/equipment/consumables/talismans). When you [Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=520) to that item, you can thread the talisman onto the cord, activating the cord's preserving effects. The cord is attuned to a particular school of magic, chosen when the cord was created. It gains the corresponding trait for that school. When you activate a talisman threaded through a cord with the same magic school trait that's also the cord's level or lower, attempt a DC 16 flat check. On a success, that talisman is not consumed and can be used again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Talisman Cord (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

**Price** 85 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Talisman Cord
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This cord is attuned to two schools of magic, and since it's higher level, it can hold higher-level talismans.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Talisman Cord (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

**Price** 8,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The cord is attuned to three schools of magic, and since it's higher level, it can hold higher-level talismans.
name: Talisman Cord (Lesser)
